  • Constructor Details

    • IntermediateSprint

      public IntermediateSprint(Double location, int parentStageId) throws InvalidLocationException, InvalidStageStateException, InvalidStageTypeException
      Constructor for the intermediate sprint
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the intermediate sprint
      parentStageId - the ID of the stage that the intermediate sprint is on
      Throws:
      InvalidLocationException - if the location is out of range of the stage
      InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is not in the correct state
      InvalidStageTypeException - if the stage is not of the correct type
